POtHS 2 - Bible Movies - 03 - When Gods Spirit Moves

Description:

When's God Spirit Moves

Pastor Jim Cymbala explores the person and work of the Holy Spirit in this six-session DVD study that will bring a fresh sense of GodÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s power to your church and your life as a follower of Jesus.

Description:
What happens when the Holy Spirit moves in a church?

Session 1 - The Spirit at Work:


Learn about the person of the Holy Spirit and why it is important for us to make room for the work of the Spirit in our lives and in our churches.

Why do we tend to ignore or downplay the work of the Spirit?

In what areas of life should we look for and expect the Spirit?


Session 2 - The SpiritÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Creates:

One of the unique works of the Spirit is to give life and empowerment to GodÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s creation.

Learn how the creative power of GodÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Spirit empowers us to be creative, and to honor God with our gifts and talents.


Session 3 - The SpiritÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Reveals:

The Holy Spirit gives direction and revelation to the church.

How does the Spirit speak to us today?

This session teaches you how to listen in prayer, and how to apply the Word of God in the process of discernment.


Session 4 - The SpiritÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Heals:

Oil is a frequent symbol of the Holy Spirit and was used by the disciples of Jesus and the early church as they prayed for healing.

The Spirit is active in the work of healing our bodies, our emotions, and our relationships.


Session 5: The SpiritÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦Transforms:

As the Holy Spirit works in our lives, we begin to bear the fruits of the SpiritÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s work in our character and actions.

Personal transformation leads to transformation of our communities and our world through the changed lives of believers.


Session 6 - Raising a Dead Church:

How can we make room for the work of the Holy Spirit in our churches today?

How do we prepare our churches for revival?


Our greatest need is for the church to become a place where the message of the gospel is heard and people experience the life-giving power of a grace-filled community.
